hiveArticle.title: Free Bitcoins - Trusted and Verified
hiveArticle.body:
Do you wonder where you can get some free bitcoins? As of now Bitcoin is over 4000$, and its very difficult to get even 1 Bitcoin (you can get bitcoins even in 1$) but that's not the point. We can see the benefits of using them but we are skeptical that what if it crashes tomorrow.

So, in this post, I will share one such site which is trusted and its verified by me. Before jumping in letâ€™s just be clear, there is no shortcut to get wealthy without working or investing for it. Say, in Steemit also you have to work hard day and night to write good posts to see your earnings increase. It is just impossible to make an income in bitcoins or any other currency just by clicking around on some websites.

### Disclaimer: You will not get rich in earning bitcoins, is just that you will get extra bitcoins to play with Cryptos, if you have not started. I am also not posting my referrer id if you think that it is just to get enough referrers.
###

One such website is FreeBitcoin (https://freebitco.in), which I am using for the last 1 month. The model of this website is you will earn Satoshis every hour (As of now the satoshis is 44). 

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRiwF3ipreo6y3anv7f97Ley46R6qfxU7PMLeb8mkJ1CH/image.png)

You have to click the Play button and based on the Lucky Number you will get the payments. I have even got 500 satoshis but which is very rare. Once you have played you have to wait 60 minutes until you play again.

Then you have an option to play bet. There is 47.5% chance that you will win the bet. Try to play it on your own risk because you sometimes lose a lot. I have lost more than 8000 satoshis by ignoring the fact. Now I am little more thoughtful.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUufHKsA6wdQhcquJhgsj1fgMhWtr3apnDgJ2EczepZav/image.png)

Now if you have more than 30000 satoshis you will even earn interest(Annual interest 4.08%). I have earned around  150 satoshis in interest.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaksBiSa7SfrjU8tDYRyfp6bLuHiAnsz2KyJpJwKoR46b/image.png)

I will leave other things to be explored by you itself. Just before ending this post I would like to tell you that I have earned 0.00051461 BTC till now. As I said it's not huge, but can be tried.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcmxRVrAB5pHHMgXa2wLAQQsnhN843HoEqgqLVmJyVTut/image.png)

### Disclaimer Again:  I am also not posting my referrer id if you think that this post is just to get enough referrers.

### Upvote, Follow, Resteem @codingdefined
